Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2012 09:30PM scaredinnj wrote: Thank you so much for writing this.  I was diagnosed two years ago and the fear was so strong.  I often wished I was one of those "strong" women you seem to hear about all the time.  But I wasn't.  I was anxiety-filled.  If I had seen something like this when I was first diagnosed, maybe it would have eased my fears a little.
Posts.Title: 29-ish Months Post-Diagnosis: You Will Get Through This! Kaidog MNSusan
